text: 'in 'iibrahim kan 'imamana fi alkhyr, wakan tayea khadeana llh, la ymyl ean din al'islam mwhhidana lilah ghayr mushrik bh, wakan shakrana lnem allah elyh, aikhtarah allah lrsalth, warshdh 'iilaa altariq almstqym, wahu al'islam, wataynah fi aldunya niemat hasanatan min althna' ealayh fi alakhiryn walqdwt bh, walwld alsalh, wa'iinah eind allah fi alakhirat lamin alsaalihin 'ashab almanazil alealyt
